statements: SELECT * FROM network_topology;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_type FROM network_topology WHERE node_status = TRUE;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_location FROM network_topology ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT node_location, node_type FROM network_topology WHERE node_status = FALSE LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM network_topology WHERE node_type = 'router';
SELECT * FROM network_topology WHERE node_status = TRUE ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_location FROM network_topology WHERE node_type = 'Router' ORDER BY node_id ASC;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_type, node_location FROM network_topology WHERE node_type = 'Firewall' AND node_status = FALSE;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_type FROM network_topology WHERE node_location LIKE 'Lab%' AND node_status = TRUE ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_topology WHERE node_location = 'Data Center' AND node_status = FALSE ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, location_id FROM network_devices ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%Cisco%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_id FROM network_devices WHERE location_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT connection_id, device_id1, device_id2, connection_speed FROM connections WHERE connection_speed > 100;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, location_id FROM network_devices ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, connection_speed FROM network_devices JOIN connections ON network_devices.device_id = connections.device_id1 WHERE connection_speed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM connections WHERE connection_type = 'Ethernet' AND connection_speed > 1000 ORDER BY connection_speed ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location_id FROM network_devices WHERE device_type IN ('Switch', 'Router') ORDER BY device_name ASC, location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_connections WHERE connection_speed > 1000;
SELECT device_name, connection_speed FROM network_devices JOIN network_connections ON network_devices.device_id = network_connections.destination_device_id;
SELECT device_name, log_timestamp, log_type FROM network_devices JOIN network_logs ON network_devices.device_id = network_logs.device_id ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_ip, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT nd.device_name, nl.log_timestamp, nl.log_type, nl.log_message FROM network_devices nd JOIN network_logs nl ON nd.device_id = nl.device_id;

SELECT nc.source_device_id, nd.device_name AS source_device_name, nc.destination_device_id, nl.device_id AS destination_device_id FROM network_connections nc JOIN network_devices nd ON nc.source_device_id = nd.device_id JOIN network_logs nl ON nc.destination_device_id = nl.device_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_connections, AVG(connection_speed) AS avg_speed FROM network_connections;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT * FROM NetworkConnections WHERE connection_status = 'Active';
SELECT segment_name FROM NetworkSegments WHERE segment_type = 'Internal' ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type='Router';
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address, device_type FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkConnections WHERE connection_type='Ethernet' AND connection_status='Connected';
SELECT router_name, router_ip_address FROM NetworkRouters INNER JOIN NetworkSegments ON NetworkRouters.router_id = NetworkSegments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT connection_id, connection_type FROM NetworkConnections WHERE device_id_a = 1;
SELECT segment_name, subnet, gateway_ip FROM NetworkSegments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT map_id, map_name, created_date FROM NetworkMap ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'switch' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT connection_id, device_id_a, device_id_b, connection_type FROM NetworkConnections WHERE connection_type LIKE '%VPN%';
SELECT segment_name, subnet, gateway_ip FROM NetworkSegments WHERE segment_id > 5 ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
